title: Projects Website
subtitle: You're on it!
description: A website to host weekend projects and other requisite information.
learning: Brush up on using Netlify for hosting

title: Polling App
subtitle: Simple user polls, with no sign-up required.
description: A website to host user created polls, shareable via link, and display poll results.
learning: Sharpen proficiency in building containerized applications
Gain familiarization with Material UI components and tools

title: MongoDB Authentication API
subtitle: Quick and clean JWT Authentication example.
description: A simple authentication API built using FastAPI and MongoDB, designed to authenticate users using JWT.
learning: Learn the uses and applications of JWT for authentication
Practice utilizing password hashing strategies within an API
Gain familiarization with NoSQL databases for authentication purposes
